Package com.tloj.game.collectables.items

package com.tloj.game.collectables.items

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttackElixir
    Represents the Consumable Item Attack Elixir in the game.
    The Attack Elixir can boost the attack stat of the player of 4 for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 15
    DefenseElixir
    Represents the Consumable Item Defense Elixir in the game.
    The Defense Elixir can boost the defense stat of the player of 4 for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 15
    Emp
    Represents the Consumable Item EMP in the game.
    The EMP allows the player to skip trap rooms without dice rolls, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.1, with an in game cost of 35
    GreatHealthPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Great Health Potion in the game.
    The Health Potion can restore the Health Points of the player by 50, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.3, with an in game cost of 18
    GreatManaPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Great Mana Potion in the game.
    The Great Mana Potion can restore the Mana of the player by 30, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.3, with an in game cost of 18
    HealthPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Health Potion in the game.
    The Health Potion can restore the Health Points of the player by 20, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 10
    ManaPotion
    Represents the Consumable Item Mana Potion in the game.
    The Mana Potion can restore the Mana of the player by 10, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.2, with an in game cost of 10
    NorthStar
    Represents the Consumable Item NorthStar in the game.
    The NorthStar can print the entire game map, it can be found as a special reward.
    It weighs 0.0
    Ragu
    Represents the Consumable Item Ragu in the game.
    Item Ragu restore all HP and Mana, boosts def stat and the damage inflicted by a 2 factor for the duration of a fight, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 1.0, with an in game cost of 0
    SpecialKey
    Represents the Consumable Item Special Key in the game.
    The Special Key opens a special locked loot room, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.0, with an in game cost of D
    WeaponShard
    Represents the Consumable Item Weapon Shard in the game.
    The Weapon Shard upgrades the current weapon of the player if given to a smith, it can be found or purchased in the game.
    It weighs 0.5, with an in game cost of 40
